title: Problem 2108_B
statement: On a recent birthday, your best friend Maurice gave you a pair of numbers n and x, and asked you to construct an array of positive numbers a of length n such that a_1 \oplus a_2 \oplus ·s \oplus a_n = x ^{\text{∗}}. This task seemed too simple to you, and therefore you decided to give Maurice a return gift by constructing an array among all such arrays that has the smallest sum of its elements.
